packages.name: math
packages.description: Math utility functions: factorial, fibonacci, gcd, lcm, power

packages.name: strings
packages.description: String utility functions: repeat, is_empty, char counting

packages.name: algorithms
packages.description: Common algorithms: bubble sort, binary search, sum, min/max of arrays

packages.name: arrays
packages.description: Array utility functions: average, product, index_of, last_index_of, is_sorted

packages.name: conversion
packages.description: Number and character conversion utilities: is_prime, digit_count, to_upper, to_lower, is_palindrome_num

packages.name: bitwise
packages.description: Bitwise utility functions: count_ones, is_power_of_two, next_power_of_two, lowest_set, highest_bit_pos
